Statement of spokesman for DPRK FM distributed as UN document
    Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The  statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on August 30 denouncing Japan for intensifying the  anti-DPRK campaign by bringing a report of the "Tokyo forum on nuclear non-proliferation and nuclear disarmament" before the UN was distributed as an official document S/1999/938 of the United Nations Security Council on September 3.
